name: Adaptive Helm
description:
Combat Start: Gain different bonuses based on starting position.

Front Two Rows: 40 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 1 Mana when struck by an attack.

Back Two Rows: 20 Ability Power. Gain 10 Mana every 3 seconds.

name: Archangel's Staff
description: Combat start: Gain 30 Ability Power every 5 seconds in combat.

name: Bloodthirster
description:
Gain 20% Omnivamp.

Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

name: Blue Buff
description:
Max mana reduced by 10.

When the holder gets a takedown, they deal 7% more damage for 8 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

name: Brample Vest
description:
Gain 5% max health.

Take 7% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal 100 magic damage to all adjacent enemies.

Cooldown: 2 seconds

name: Crownguard
description:
Combat start: Gain a 30% max Health Shield for 8 seconds.

When the shield expires, gain 35 Ability Power.

name: Deathblade
description: Deal 7% bonus damage.

name: Dragon's Claw
description:
Gain 9% max health.

Every 2 seconds, heal 5% max Health.

name: Edge of Night
description:
Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects. Then, gain 15% bonus Attack Speed.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

name: Evenshroud
description:
30% Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 10 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
description: Gain 10 Armor and 10 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

name: Giant Slayer
description: Deal 25% more damage to enemies with more than 1600 maximum Health.

name: Guardbreaker
description: After damaging a Shield, deal 25% more damage for 3 seconds.

name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
description: Attacks grant 5% stacking Attack Speed.

name: Hand of Justice
description:
Gain 2 effects:

• 15% Attack Damage and 15 Ability Power.
• 15% Omnivamp.

Each round, randomly double 1 of these effects.

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

name: Hextech Gunblade
description:
Grant 22% Omnivamp, which also heals the lowest percent Health ally.
Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

name: Infinity Edge
description:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

name: Ionic Spark
description:
30% Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 160% of their maximum Mana.
Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

name: Jeweled Gauntlet
description:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

name: Last Whisper
description:
Physical damage 30% Sunders the target for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

Sunder: Reduce Armor

name: Morellonomicon
description:
Attacks and Abilities deal 1% Burn and 33% Wound to enemies for 10 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

name: Nashor's Tooth
description: After casting an Ability, gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

name: Protector's Vow
description: Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts 5 seconds and gain 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resist.

name: Quicksilver
description:
Combat start: Gain immunity to crowd control for 14 seconds. During this time, gain 3% Attack Speed every 2 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

name: Rabadon's Deathcap
description: Deal 20% bonus damage.

name: Red Buff
description:
Deal 5% bonus damage.

Attacks and Abilities 1% Burn and 33% Wound enemies for 5 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second

Wound: Reduces healing received

name: Redemption
description:
Heal allies within 1 hex for 15% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also take 10% less damage for 5 seconds (damage reduction does not stack).

[Aura item]

name: Runaan's Hurricane
description: Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing 55% Attack Damage as physical damage.

name: Spear of Shojin
description: Attacks grant 5 bonus Mana.

name: Statikk Shiv
description:
Every 3rd attack deals 35 magic damage and 30% Shreds 4 enemies for 5 seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

name: Steadfast Heart
description: Take 8% less damage. While above 50% Health, take 15% less damage instead.

name: Sterak's Gage
description: Once per combat at 60% Health, gain 20% max Health and 35% Attack Damage.

name: Sunfire Cape
description:
Every 2 seconds, deal 1% Burn and 33% Wound to an enemy within 2 hexes for 10 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

name: Tactician's Crown
description: Your team gains +1 maximum team size.

name: Thief's Gloves
description:
Each round: Equip 2 random items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

name: Titan's Resolve
description:
Each round: Equip 2 random items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

name: Warmog's Armor
description: Gain 7% max health.

name: Dryad Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Dryad trait.

[Unique - only 1 per champion.]

name: Fated Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Fated trait.

Fated Bonus: Restore 2% Health every 3 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion.]

name: Ghostly Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Ghostly trait.

[Unique - only 1 per champion.]

name: Heavenly Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Heavenly trait.

[Unique - only 1 per champion.]

name: Mythic Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Mythic trait.

[Unique - only 1 per champion.]

name: Porcelain Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Porcelain trait.

[Unique - only 1 per champion.]

name: Storyweaver Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Storyweaver trait.

[Unique - only 1 per champion.]

name: Umbral Emblem
description:
The holder gains the Umbral trait.

[Unique - only 1 per champion.]
